Name: Mei Lin

Special Abilities.Ki Strike: Unarmed attacks treated as magical weapons
Special Abilities.Purity of Body (Ex): Immunity to all diseases, including supernatural and magical diseases.
Special Abilities.Evasion: No damage on successful Reflex save

Feats: Combat Reflexes (up to 5 attacks of opportunity)
Still Mind (+2 bonus on saving for enchantment spells & effects)

Equipment.Golden Chalice: 1/day: can cast augury, 3/day cast cure light wounds
Equipment.Ring of Protection +1: +1 to AC and +1 to all saves
Equipment.Potion of Heroism: The drinker gains a +2 morale bonus on attack rolls, saves, and skill checks for 30 minutes

Notes.extra attack: Cost: 1 Ki Point Effect: Mei Lin can make one additional attack at her highest attack bonus when using Flurry of Blows.
Notes.increased speed: Cost: 1 Ki Point, Effect: Mei Lin can increase her speed by 20 feet for 1 round.
Notes.bonus to AC: Cost: 1 Ki Point, Effect: Mei Lin can gain a +4 dodge bonus to AC for 1 round. This is particularly useful for avoiding attacks in tight situations.
